timeline.bodyText: The underlying ml-javaclient-util library doesn't yet support "node_update", as an FYI. So we may not want to list it yet in the tooltip.
timeline.author: rjrudin

replies.bodyText: I removed 'node-update' from the list valid capabilities (ui will throw a validation error if capability is set to 'node-update'), tooltip and error message.
replies.author: srinathgit

replies.bodyText: I think that's fine for now, we'll likely need to update all of DHF later to support "node update" across the board.
replies.author: rjrudin
